concept.title: How to Make it Through Your First Year
concept.shortdesc: College is tough, and no one expects you to be able to know exactly what you're doing. However, with a little help, you will be on your way to navigating college all on your own!

conbody.p: I have attached three "How to" documents for you. Since I survived my first year, I thought that I would include some tips that I think you would find helpful. Also note that you can meet people this way too! College is a big place and, honestly, you never know when or where you might meet someone new! Make a friend on the bus or invite someone out for ice cream, it will be fun!
